original_title: Customs orders to re-export 75,000 kg of rice unsuitable for consumption
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka Customs says that weevils (Gullo) have been detected in 50,000 Kg of imported rice while issues with product information labels have been detected in another 25,000 Kg of imported rice.
Accordingly, the respective importers have been ordered to re-export the relevant rice consignments or face confiscation of defective stocks.
